about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a sophisticated document signing solution that supports an extensive array of signature types, including text, images, barcodes, digital certificates, and stamps. Compatible with over 60 file formats—such as PDF, MS Office, images, ZIP files, and more—this tool enables you to not only apply signatures but also search, verify, modify, or remove them as needed.

more_features.title: Enhance and safeguard your documents with advanced signature capabilities
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library is engineered to facilitate comprehensive document signing and processing across widely used file formats. With ease, you can add, adjust, verify, or remove different types of signatures.

feature_1.title: Versatile document signing
feature_1.content: Efficiently sign any page within supported documents using text, images, barcodes, QR codes, or stamps. Additionally, embed hidden metadata, such as EXIF data in images, or secure your document’s content against unauthorized alterations using digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Comprehensive signature search and verification
feature_2.content: Our tool offers robust functionality for working with signed documents. Ensure the integrity of your documents by verifying signatures, and easily retrieve a comprehensive list of all signatures within a document through our search feature.

feature_3.title: Edit signatures with ease
feature_3.content: Nearly all previously applied signatures can be modified. Conveniently update text, adjust positioning, or change colors to meet your needs.

feature_4.title: Efficient signature deletion
feature_4.content: Our solution fully supports CRUD operations for signatures, allowing for the swift removal of any unwanted or outdated signatures from your documents.

formats.title: Sign documents across a variety of formats
formats.description: Our {{EnvName}} API supports the signing of more than 60 different formats. Effortlessly place various types of signatures on any page or at any desired position within your documents.
